title: Building this portfolio
content:
# Building this portfolio

I built this site with **Next.js**, **TypeScript**, and **Supabase**.

## Highlights
- Auth and data via Supabase
- i18n with next-intl
- shadcn/ui for components

## Lessons learned
- Keep content in Markdown to stay flexible
- Prefer server components for data fetching

See the source on [GitHub](https://github.com/wiebe-vandendriessche).
summary: Building this portfolio with Next.js, TypeScript and Supabase — highlights, choices and lessons.
author: Wiebe Vandendriessche

title: Portfolio bouwen
content:
# Portfolio bouwen

Deze site is gebouwd met **Next.js**, **TypeScript** en **Supabase**.

## Hoogtepunten
- Auth en data via Supabase
- i18n met next-intl
- shadcn/ui voor componenten

## Lessen
- Content in Markdown houdt het flexibel
- Server components voor data-fetching
summary: Portfolio bouwen met Next.js, TypeScript en Supabase — hoogtepunten, keuzes en lessen.
author: Wiebe Vandendriessche

title: Notes on AI
content:
# Notes on AI

Some quick reflections on **safety**, _reproducibility_ and **transparency**.

- Prefer smaller, auditable components
- Document data lineage
- Measure drift proactively

More soon.
summary: Quick reflections on safety, reproducibility and transparency in AI.
author: Wiebe Vandendriessche

title: Notities over AI
content:
# Notities over AI

Korte reflecties over **veiligheid**, _reproduceerbaarheid_ en **transparantie**.

- Liever kleinere, controleerbare componenten
- Documenteer datalijn (lineage)
- Meet drift proactief

Binnenkort meer.
summary: Korte reflecties over veiligheid, reproduceerbaarheid en transparantie in AI.
author: Wiebe Vandendriessche
